content.raw: this failure mode can be fixed by adding a `world->Step(1);` before calling `World::RemoveModel` in the test.  I think what happened is the entity creation has not completed before the model removal is invoked.
content.html: this failure mode can be fixed by adding a world->Step(1); before calling World::RemoveModel in the test. I think what happened is the entity creation has not completed before the model removal is invoked.

content.raw:
~~The no-gpu build doesn't run the `INTEGRATION_world` test since it requires a GPU (uses a PR2 I think)~~ (that's not true). The test has failed on both [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/585/testReport/junit/%28root%29/INTEGRATION_world/test_ran/) and the [coverage build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-coverage-trusty-amd64/435/testReport/junit/%28root%29/INTEGRATION_world/test_ran/), so I don't think it's a fluke

UPDATE: on further review, it does appear to be a flaky test
content.html:
The no-gpu build doesn't run the INTEGRATION_world test since it requires a GPU (uses a PR2 I think) (that's not true). The test has failed on both homebrew and the coverage build, so I don't think it's a fluke

UPDATE: on further review, it does appear to be a flaky test
